```{r}
#Importing data
Lab_data_test <- read.csv("~/College of Charleston/Thesis/R/Thesis/Lab_data_test.csv")

#Importing packages
library(ggplot2)
```

SIDE CAMERA

```{r}
#Side max acceleration max per substrate Boxplot
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(x=Substrate_type, y=side_amax)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
#Side max acceleration max per substrate Histogram
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(side_amax))  + 
  geom_histogram(fill="orange") +
  facet_wrap(~Substrate_type)
```

```{r}
#Side max acceleration per sex Boxplot
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(x=Sex, y=side_amax)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
#Side max acceleration per sex Histogram
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(side_amax))  + 
  geom_histogram(fill="orange") +
  facet_wrap(~Sex)
```

```{r}
#Side max velocity per sex Boxplot
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(x=Substrate_type, y=side_vmax)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
#Side max velocity per sex Histogram
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(side_vmax)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "blue") +
  facet_wrap(~Sex)
```


```{r}
#Side max velocity per substrate Boxplot
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(x=Substrate_type, y=side_vmax)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
#Side max velocity per substrate Histogram
ggplot(data = Lab_data_test, aes(side_vmax))  + 
  geom_histogram(fill="blue") +
  facet_wrap(~Substrate_type)
```
